content.raw:
I will try, but it may take time for me to reproduce as well. We are finding these issues by chance when the robot get stuck, and their behavior has changed since some recent subt repo updates. 

Any idea about the frictionless problem? If we catch that again, we’ll take a video. It seems to only be a problem in the curved tunnel tile, and it has happened more than once.
content.html:
I will try, but it may take time for me to reproduce as well. We are finding these issues by chance when the robot get stuck, and their behavior has changed since some recent subt repo updates.

Any idea about the frictionless problem? If we catch that again, we’ll take a video. It seems to only be a problem in the curved tunnel tile, and it has happened more than once.
